# File lib/paperclip/matchers/validate_attachment_content_type_matcher.rb, line 45
        def allow_types?(types)
          types.all? do |type|
            file = StringIO.new(".")
            file.content_type = type
            (subject = @subject.new).attachment_for(@attachment_name).assign(file)
            subject.valid? && subject.errors.on("#{@attachment_name}_content_type""#{@attachment_name}_content_type").blank?
          end
        end
